change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Scrapbooks of George W. P. Hunt, 1910-1932

origination.label: Creator
origination.persname: Hunt, George W. P. (George Wylie Paul), 1859-1934.

did.abstract: This collection contains seventy scrapbooks of news clippings from various newspapers and magazines, with a few photographs, drawings, and silhouettes of Hunt and his family and friends. Articles are about Hunt's career, Arizona's statehood, prison reform, highway construction, and development of the Colorado River.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Scrapbooks of George W. P. Hunt (AZ 080). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Arizona politician. President of the Arizona Constitutional Convention, 1910; Governor of Arizona, 1912 -1919, 1923-1929, and 1931-1933.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Seventy scrapbooks of news clippings from various newspapers and magazines, with a few photographs, drawings, and silhouettes of Hunt and his family and friends. Articles are about Hunt's career, Arizona's statehood, prison reform, highway construction, and development of the Colorado River.
